mapper.sql: id, user_id, start_time, end_time, vip_level, level_desc, vip_type, status, add_time, update_time, vip_no, is_send_message, free_top_count
mapper.insert: insert into user_vip (id, user_id, start_time, end_time, vip_level, level_desc, vip_type, status, add_time, update_time, vip_no, is_send_message, free_top_count) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{levelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vipType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{vipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isSendMessage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{freeTopCount,jdbcType=INTEGER})

mapper.update:
update user_vip
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
vip_level = #{vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER},
level_desc = #{levelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
vip_type = #{vipType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
vip_no = #{vipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_send_message = #{isSendMessage,jdbcType=INTEGER},
free_top_count = #{freeTopCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update user_vip set user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vip_level = #{vipLevel,jdbcType=INTEGER}, level_desc = #{levelDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, vip_type = #{vipType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, add_time = #{addTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, vip_no = #{vipNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_send_message = #{isSendMessage,jdbcType=INTEGER}, free_top_count = #{freeTopCount,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select * from user_vip where end_time < #{endTime} and status = 1
select a.* from user_vip a,user_info b where a.user_id = b.id and a.status = 1 and ((a.vip_level = 1 and a.free_top_count <> 3) or (a.vip_level = 2 and a.free_top_count <> 8)) and b.status = 1
